spells.name: Absolute Zero
spells.description: A swirling vortex flash freezes the air, dealing 10d8 cold damage. On a critical failure, the creature is immobilized by a layer of ice (50 HP, Hardness 5).

heightened.effect: The damage increases by 1d8 and the ice’s Hit Points increase by 5.

spells.name: Acid Grip
spells.description: An ephemeral, taloned hand grips the target, burning it with magical acid. The target takes 2d8 acid damage plus 1d6 persistent acid damage depending on its Reflex save. A creature taking persistent damage from this spell takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds. The hand can also move the target.

heightened.effect: The initial damage increases by 2d8, and the persistent acid damage increases by 1d6.

spells.name: Adhere
spells.targets: 1 held or unattended object or a 5-foot square surface
spells.description: You create a molecular bond between an unattended object you touch (or an object you’re holding) and another object or surface that object is touching. Pulling the object free requires a successful Athletics check against your spell DC. If you touch a square, it becomes greater difficult terrain.

spells.name: Aerial Form
spells.description: You harness your mastery of the sky to reshape your body into a Medium flying animal battle form (Bat, Bird, Pterosaur, or Wasp). You gain AC=18+level, temporary HP, low-light vision, flight, and specific melee attacks based on the form.

heightened.effect: Battle form is Large, fly Speed +10 ft, 10 temp HP, attack +18, damage +8.
Battle form is Huge, fly Speed +15 ft, 10 ft reach, AC=21+level, 15 temp HP, attack +21, damage +4 (double dice).

spells.name: Air Bubble
spells.trigger: A creature within range enters an environment where it can’t breathe.
spells.description: A bubble of pure air appears around the target’s head, allowing it to breathe normally. The effect ends as soon as the target returns to an environment where it can breathe normally.

spells.name: Akashic Download
spells.requirements: You have a comm unit or computer, used as a locus.
spells.description: You execute a psychic search of the Akashic Record for information about a specific topic. You gain a +1 status bonus to Recall Knowledge checks on that topic when consulting your comm unit.

heightened.effect: You can reference your comm unit three times before the spell ends.

spells.name: Akashic Revival
spells.description: You dispatch perfect documentation of the target’s physical body to the Akashic Record. If the target dies, it can recall its recorded body, reappearing in the corpse's space with 1 HP.

spells.name: Alarm
spells.description: You ward an area to alert you when creatures enter without a password. You choose a mental alert or an audible alarm.

heightened.effect: You can specify a trigger for which types of creatures sound the alarm.

spells.name: Analyze Target
spells.description: You focus on the target, gathering data. You gain a +1 status bonus to checks to Impersonate, Treat Wounds, and Recall Knowledge about the target.

heightened.effect: The bonus increases to +2, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
The bonus increases to +3, and you can target any number of creatures.

spells.name: Animal Form
spells.description: You call upon primal energy to transform yourself into a Medium animal battle form (Ape, Bear, Bull, Canine, Cat, Deer, Frog, Shark, or Snake). You gain AC=16+level, 5 temp HP, low-light vision, imprecise scent, and specific attacks.

heightened.effect: Battle form is Large, 10 ft reach, 15 temp HP, AC=18+level, attack +16, damage +9.
Battle form is Huge, 15 ft reach, 20 temp HP, AC=18+level, attack +18, damage +7 (double dice).

spells.name: Ant Haul
spells.description: You reinforce the target’s musculoskeletal system to bear more weight. The target can carry 3 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 6 more Bulk.

spells.name: Arctic Rift
spells.description: A jagged crack opens in the air, dealing 12d8 cold damage. Critical failure immobilizes the target in ice (60 HP, Hardness 5).

heightened.effect: The damage increases by 1d8 and the ice’s Hit Points increase by 5.

spells.name: Atomic Blast
spells.description: You magically split an atom, creating an explosion with radioactive fallout. Targets take 5d12 bludgeoning and 5d12 fire damage and are exposed to extreme radiation.

spells.name: Augury
spells.description: You gain a vague glimpse of the future. Predicts results up to 30 minutes into the future: good, bad, mixed, or nothing.

spells.name: Avatar
spells.description: You transform into an avatar of your deity, assuming a Huge battle form. You gain AC=25+level, 30 temp HP, darkvision, the cosmic trait, and specific abilities/attacks based on your deity (e.g., Abadar, Besmara, Damoritosh, Triune, etc.).

spells.name: Bane
spells.description: You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt. Enemies in the area take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls. Can be Sustained to increase radius.
